note: Black Lives Matter ✊ Trans rights are human rights 🏳️‍⚧️ Disability ♿️ & LGBTQIA2S+ 🏳️‍🌈 ally. Land Back. Introvert in the PNW trying to survive the ongoing pandemic 😷💉 Mom to 🧒👧👶🐈‍⬛🐈‍⬛🐶🐓🐓🐓🐓 🦆🦆🦆🦆🦆Beginner gardener on (almost) 2 acres in 8b 👩‍🌾 Novice knitter 🧶 Posts are my own.  Pfp alt text: Face of a white woman with red hair and black framed glasses. A black cat with yellow eyes is looking at the camera and covering the woman’s nose and mouth. #CovidIsAirborne #MaskUp #ImmunizeUnder5s
